about_the_game:
Hue Hue Defense, as the name suggests, is a Brazilian Tower Defense game. In this world, the king of trolling, Hue Hue B'Erri, is directing his fleet of meme-clad "undead." Reduce his fleet and stop him from reaching the city airport, or it will be a global catastrophe.

Mechanics


Manage four types of towers:

Laje Tower: A tower with long-range and two units that attack independently, with upgrades that double the attack power up to an angry pinscher. Use this tower to your advantage against slow enemies.

Meme Tower: Summon the help of the most chadd dog on the internet, capable of paralyzing one enemy at a time and causing area damage. Its upgrades vary from a life-sized Goliath to a full bladder!

Gambiarra Tower: The house specialty, a long-range tower with continuous attack. Among the upgrade options, we have a super coil and heat dissipators. *Without this tower, no other tower can gain upgrades

Football Tower: THIS IS A CANNON! Literally... a medium-range tower with slow attack speed but great area damage. Upgrade with goalposts or floodlights.

Haggle:

Mr. Buchecha has a bazaar and a huge greed. Instead of fixed prices, here you run the risk of losing out. Be quick and decisive when negotiating with him.

Upgrades:

By defeating an enemy, there is a chance they will drop an item. Use these to upgrade your towers.

Vehicle Towers:

These are temporary. Collect gas cans dropped by enemies and use them to call for four-wheeled help. After some time, they will disappear.

Other Mechanics


Interact with clicks in various ways. Throughout the game, you will face challenges that could lead to your demise. Be quick.

*This game is in development and may undergo changes in the final product.
